Text: Fwd jobsPST From Ethan Klemperer To Subject jobs Date Wed Jan Cooper I just got your email from my sister who says that you are working for Enron right now In leiu of recent events my thought was that you might be looking at potential opportunities for employment Right now I am working at a risk management firm that does alot of consulting work in the energy field our core products are related to financial services Right now our biggest client is El Paso but we have also done work for Enron and BP Our consulting requires serious analytical and math skills most people at the company are outrageously smart most and good people skills It of course would require moving to NYC but alot of the work is in Texas So anyway if you are at all interested shoot me your resumeI am getting alot of pressure from Ru and KT to get you to the East Coast so let me know if there is anything I can do Happy New Year Ethan Ethan Klemperer ERisk Main Fax Direct Email Riskcom MSN Photos is the easiest way to share and print your photos supportworldwideaspx
